name: Poppin' Hoppin' Unlockin'
description:
Poppin' Hoppin' Unlockin'

Is an original game by Cold Of Auril. You Play as Gizmo the Wizard, a hopeless sorcerer who's had his arms stolen! The aim of the game is to beat the puzzles, find the keys, unlock the doors and reach the top of the tower to get your arms back!

Controls:

A & D - To move Left & Right

SPACE - To Jump
Hold SPACE - To charge your Dash

Then A or D to release your Dash

Credits:
Project Leader - Amy Elliott
Sound Design - Gabe Stott
3D Asset Design - Cam Hill, Rob Cole
Level Design/ Creation - Mohamed Elfayomy, Luke Carr, Amy Elliott, Ben Webb
Programming - Mohamed Elfayomy, Luke Carr, Bryce Reading, Amy Elliott, Ben Webb
